name: Tooth Ahead!
description:
Game made for the Global Game 2021 : "Lost & Found" (Page of the game)

======
Game made in 30 hours (unfortunately we started late, so many elements are missing, but we'll keep developing the game during February,  don't hesitate to follow to check our progress!).
